00040 ConnectionEditor::ConnectionEditor(QWidget *parent, LibraryInterface* handler):
00041 QWidget(parent),
00042 busType_(this),
00043 absType_(this),
00044 instanceLabel_(tr("Connected interfaces"), this),
00045 connectedInstances_(this),
00046 separator_(this),
00047 nameLabel_(tr("Connection name"), this),
00048 nameEdit_(this),
00049 descriptionLabel_(tr("Description"), this),
00050 descriptionEdit_(this),
00051 portsLabel_(tr("Connected physical ports"), this),
00052 portWidget_(this),
00053 connection_(NULL),
00054 handler_(handler) {
00055 
00056         Q_ASSERT(parent);
00057         Q_ASSERT(handler);
00058 
00059         busType_.setTitle(tr("Bus type"));
00060         busType_.setFlat(false);
00061         absType_.setTitle(tr("Abstraction type"));
00062         absType_.setFlat(false);
00063 
00064         separator_.setFlat(true);
00065 
00066         // set validator for name edit
00067         nameEdit_.setValidator(new VhdlNameValidator(&nameEdit_));
00068 
00069         // There are always 2 columns.
00070         portWidget_.setColumnCount(2);
00071         portWidget_.setHorizontalHeaderItem(0, new QTableWidgetItem(tr("instance1")));
00072         portWidget_.setHorizontalHeaderItem(1, new QTableWidgetItem(tr("instance2")));
00073         portWidget_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00074         portWidget_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00075         portWidget_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00076         portWidget_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00077 
00078         // set the maximum height for the description editor
00079         descriptionEdit_.setMaximumHeight(MAX_DESC_HEIGHT);
00080 
00081         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00082         layout->addWidget(&busType_);
00083         layout->addWidget(&absType_);
00084         layout->addWidget(&instanceLabel_);
00085         layout->addWidget(&connectedInstances_);
00086         layout->addWidget(&separator_);
00087         layout->addWidget(&nameLabel_);
00088         layout->addWidget(&nameEdit_);
00089         layout->addWidget(&descriptionLabel_);
00090         layout->addWidget(&descriptionEdit_);
00091         layout->addWidget(&portsLabel_);
00092         layout->addWidget(&portWidget_, 1);
00093 
00094         clear();
00095 }

00100 void ConnectionEditor::clear() {
00101         if (connection_) {
00102                 disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramInterconnection*)),
00103                         this, SLOT(clear()));
00104                 disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00105                         this, SLOT(refresh()));
00106                 connection_ = 0;
00107         }
00108 
00109         disconnect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00110                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)));
00111         disconnect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00112                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()));
00113 
00114         // clear the contents of the editors
00115         busType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00116         absType_.setVLNV(VLNV());
00117         connectedInstances_.clear();
00118         nameEdit_.clear();
00119         descriptionEdit_.clear();
00120         portWidget_.clearContents();
00121 
00122         // set objects as hidden
00123         busType_.hide();
00124         absType_.hide();
00125         instanceLabel_.hide();
00126         connectedInstances_.hide();
00127         separator_.hide();
00128         nameLabel_.hide();
00129         nameEdit_.hide();
00130         descriptionLabel_.hide();
00131         descriptionEdit_.hide();
00132         portsLabel_.hide();
00133         portWidget_.hide();
00134 
00135         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->hide();
00136 }

00138 void ConnectionEditor::refresh() {
00139         Q_ASSERT(connection_);
00140         setConnection(connection_);
00141 }
00142 
00143 void ConnectionEditor::setConnection( DiagramInterconnection* connection ) {
00144         Q_ASSERT(connection);
00145 
00146         qobject_cast<QDockWidget*>(parentWidget())->show();
00147 
00148         // disconnect the previous connection
00149         if (connection_) {
00150                 disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramInterconnection*)),
00151                         this, SLOT(clear()));
00152                 disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00153                         this, SLOT(refresh()));
00154         }
00155 
00156         connection_ = connection;
00157 
00158         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint1 = connection->endPoint1();
00159         Q_ASSERT(endPoint1);
00160 
00161         busType_.setVLNV(endPoint1->getBusInterface()->getBusType());
00162         absType_.setVLNV(endPoint1->getBusInterface()->getAbstractionType());
00163 
00164         QString endPoint1Name = endPoint1->name();
00165         QString endPoint2Name = connection->endPoint2()->name();
00166 
00167         // set the names of the connected instances
00168         connectedInstances_.setText(QString("%1 - %2").arg(endPoint1Name).arg(endPoint2Name));
00169 
00170         // set text for the name editor, signal must be disconnected when name is set 
00171         // to avoid loops 
00172         disconnect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00173                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)));
00174         nameEdit_.setText(connection->name());
00175         connect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00176                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00177 
00178         // display the current description of the interface.
00179         disconnect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00180                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()));
00181         descriptionEdit_.setPlainText(connection->description());
00182         connect(&descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00183                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00184 
00185         connect(connection, SIGNAL(destroyed(DiagramInterconnection*)),
00186                 this, SLOT(clear()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00187         connect(connection, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00188                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00189 
00190         setPortMaps();
00191 
00192     bool locked = static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(connection->scene())->isProtected();
00193         
00194         // if either end point is hierarchical then there is no description to set
00195         if (endPoint1->isHierarchical() || connection->endPoint2()->isHierarchical()) {
00196                 
00197                 // description exists only for normal interconnections
00198                 descriptionEdit_.setDisabled(true);
00199                 descriptionLabel_.hide();
00200                 descriptionEdit_.hide();
00201 
00202                 // name exists for only normal interconnections
00203                 nameLabel_.hide();
00204                 nameEdit_.hide();
00205                 nameEdit_.setDisabled(true);
00206         }
00207         else {
00208                 descriptionEdit_.setEnabled(!locked);
00209                 descriptionLabel_.show();
00210                 descriptionEdit_.show();
00211 
00212                 nameLabel_.show();
00213                 nameEdit_.show();
00214                 nameEdit_.setEnabled(!locked);
00215         }
00216 
00217         // set the objects visible
00218         busType_.show();
00219         absType_.show();
00220         instanceLabel_.show();
00221         connectedInstances_.show();
00222         separator_.show();
00223         portsLabel_.show();
00224         portWidget_.show();
00225 }

00227 void ConnectionEditor::onNameChanged( const QString& name ) {
00228         Q_ASSERT(connection_);
00229 
00230         disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00231                 this, SLOT(refresh())); 
00232 
00233         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ConnectionChangeCommand(
00234                 connection_, name, descriptionEdit_.toPlainText()));
00235         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(connection_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00236 
00237         connect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00238                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void ConnectionEditor::onDescriptionChanged() {
00242 
00243         Q_ASSERT(connection_);
00244 
00245         disconnect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00246                 this, SLOT(refresh()));
00247 
00248         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ConnectionChangeCommand(
00249                 connection_, nameEdit_.text(), descriptionEdit_.toPlainText()));
00250         static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(connection_->scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00251 
00252         connect(connection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), 
00253                 this, SLOT(refresh()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00254 }
00255 
00256 void ConnectionEditor::setPortMaps() {
00257         Q_ASSERT(connection_);
00258         
00259         portWidget_.clearContents();
00260 
00261         // get the interface and component for end point 1
00262         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf1 = connection_->endPoint1()->getBusInterface();
00263         Q_ASSERT(busIf1);
00264         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps1 = busIf1->getPortMaps();
00265         QSharedPointer<Component> comp1 = connection_->endPoint1()->ownerComponent();
00266         Q_ASSERT(comp1);
00267 
00268         // get the interface and component for end point 2
00269         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf2 = connection_->endPoint2()->getBusInterface();
00270         Q_ASSERT(busIf2);
00271         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps2 = busIf2->getPortMaps();
00272         QSharedPointer<Component> comp2 = connection_->endPoint2()->ownerComponent();
00273         Q_ASSERT(comp2);
00274 
00275         // set the header for end point 1
00276         DiagramComponent* diacomp1 = connection_->endPoint1()->encompassingComp();
00277         // if endpoint1 was a component instance
00278         if (diacomp1) {
00279                 portWidget_.horizontalHeaderItem(0)->setText(diacomp1->name());
00280         }
00281         // if was the interface of a top component
00282         else {
00283                 portWidget_.horizontalHeaderItem(0)->setText(comp1->getVlnv()->getName());
00284         }
00285 
00286         // set the header for end point 2
00287         DiagramComponent* diacomp2 = connection_->endPoint2()->encompassingComp();
00288         // if endpoint1 was a component instance
00289         if (diacomp2) {
00290                 portWidget_.horizontalHeaderItem(1)->setText(diacomp2->name());
00291         }
00292         // if was the interface of a top component
00293         else {
00294                 portWidget_.horizontalHeaderItem(1)->setText(comp2->getVlnv()->getName());
00295         }
00296 
00297         // get the abstraction def for the interfaces
00298         VLNV absDefVLNV = busIf1->getAbstractionType();
00299         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef;
00300         if (handler_->getDocumentType(absDefVLNV) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00301                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(absDefVLNV);
00302                 absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00303         }
00304 
00305         General::InterfaceMode interfaceMode1 = busIf1->getInterfaceMode();
00306         General::InterfaceMode interfaceMode2 = busIf2->getInterfaceMode();
00307 
00308         // turn off sorting when adding items
00309         portWidget_.setSortingEnabled(false);
00310 
00311         // set the size to be the max value 
00312         portWidget_.setRowCount(0);
00313 
00314         // get list of all used logical ports
00315         QStringList logicalNames;
00316         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> map, portMaps1) {
00317                 if (!logicalNames.contains(map->logicalPort_)) {
00318                         logicalNames.append(map->logicalPort_);
00319                 }
00320         }
00321         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> map, portMaps2) {
00322                 if (!logicalNames.contains(map->logicalPort_)) {
00323                         logicalNames.append(map->logicalPort_);
00324                 }
00325         }
00326 
00327         int row = 0;
00328         // find the physical ports mapped to given logical port
00329         foreach (QString logicalPort, logicalNames) {
00330 
00331                 bool invalid = false;
00332 
00333                 // check that the logical signal is contained in both interface modes used
00334                 if (absDef) {
00335                         if (!absDef->hasPort(logicalPort, interfaceMode1) ||
00336                                 !absDef->hasPort(logicalPort, interfaceMode2)) {
00337                                         invalid = true;
00338                         }
00339                 }
00340 
00341                 foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> map1, portMaps1) {
00342                         if (map1->logicalPort_ == logicalPort) {
00343 
00344                                 foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> map2, portMaps2) {
00345                                         if (map2->logicalPort_ == logicalPort) {
00346                                                 addMap(row, invalid, map1, comp1, map2, comp2);
00347                                         }
00348                                 }
00349                         }
00350                 }
00351         }
00352 
00353         // finally set sorting back on
00354         portWidget_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00355 }
00356 
00357 void ConnectionEditor::addMap( int& row, bool invalid,
00358                                                           QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap1,
00359                                                           QSharedPointer<Component> component1,
00360                                                           QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap2,
00361                                                           QSharedPointer<Component> component2) {
00362         
00363         int phys1Left = 0;
00364         int phys1Right = 0;
00365         bool phys1Invalid = invalid;
00366 
00367         // if port is vectored on the port map
00368         if (portMap1->physicalVector_) {
00369                 phys1Left = portMap1->physicalVector_->getLeft();
00370                 phys1Right = portMap1->physicalVector_->getRight();
00371 
00372                 // if the port is not found on the component
00373                 if (!component1->hasPort(portMap1->physicalPort_)) {
00374                         phys1Invalid = true;
00375                 }
00376         }
00377         // if port is found on the component then use the port bounds
00378         else if (component1->hasPort(portMap1->physicalPort_)) {
00379                 phys1Left = component1->getPortLeftBound(portMap1->physicalPort_);
00380                 phys1Right = component1->getPortRightBound(portMap1->physicalPort_);
00381         }
00382         // port was not found on the component
00383         else {
00384                 phys1Invalid = true;
00385         }
00386 
00387 
00388         int phys2Left = 0;
00389         int phys2Right = 0;
00390         bool phys2Invalid = invalid;
00391         // if port is vectored on the port map
00392         if (portMap2->physicalVector_) {
00393                 phys2Left = portMap2->physicalVector_->getLeft();
00394                 phys2Right = portMap2->physicalVector_->getRight();
00395 
00396                 // if the port is not found on the component
00397                 if (!component2->hasPort(portMap2->physicalPort_)) {
00398                         phys2Invalid = true;
00399                 }
00400         }
00401         // if port is found on the component then use the port bounds
00402         else if (component2->hasPort(portMap2->physicalPort_)) {
00403                 phys2Left = component2->getPortLeftBound(portMap2->physicalPort_);
00404                 phys2Right = component2->getPortRightBound(portMap2->physicalPort_);
00405         }
00406         // port was not found on the component
00407         else {
00408                 phys2Invalid = true;
00409         }
00410 
00411         // check the sizes of the physical ports
00412         int size1 = phys1Left - phys1Right + 1;
00413         int size2 = phys2Left - phys2Right + 1;
00414 
00415         QTableWidgetItem* port1Item;
00416         QTableWidgetItem* port2Item;
00417 
00418         // if both have vectored logical signals
00419         if (portMap1->logicalVector_ && portMap2->logicalVector_) {
00420                 
00421                 // if the vectored ports don't have any common bounds
00422                 if (portMap1->logicalVector_->getRight() > portMap2->logicalVector_->getLeft() ||
00423                         portMap1->logicalVector_->getLeft() < portMap2->logicalVector_->getRight()) {
00424                                 return;
00425                 }
00426 
00427                 int logicalLeft = qMin(portMap1->logicalVector_->getLeft(), 
00428                         portMap2->logicalVector_->getLeft());
00429                 int logicalRight = qMax(portMap1->logicalVector_->getRight(),
00430                         portMap2->logicalVector_->getRight());
00431 
00432                 QString port1;
00433                 QString port2;
00434                 
00435                 {
00436                         // count how much the left bound of port 1 has to be adjusted down
00437                         int downSize = abs(portMap1->logicalVector_->getLeft() - logicalLeft);
00438                         // count how must the right bound of  port 1 has to be adjusted up
00439                         int upSize = abs(logicalRight - portMap1->logicalVector_->getRight());
00440 
00441                         // the actual size of the connected parts of the ports
00442                         size1 = (phys1Left - downSize) - (phys1Right + upSize) + 1; 
00443 
00444                         port1 = General::port2String(portMap1->physicalPort_,
00445                                 phys1Left - downSize, phys1Right + upSize);
00446                 }
00447                 {
00448                         // count how much the left bound of port 2 has to be adjusted down
00449                         int downSize = abs(portMap2->logicalVector_->getLeft() - logicalLeft);
00450                         // count how must the right bound of  port 2 has to be adjusted up
00451                         int upSize = abs(logicalRight - portMap2->logicalVector_->getRight());
00452 
00453                         // the actual size of the connected parts of the ports
00454                         size2 = (phys2Left - downSize) - (phys2Right + upSize) + 1;
00455 
00456                         port2 = General::port2String(portMap2->physicalPort_,
00457                                 phys2Left - downSize, phys2Right + upSize);
00458                 }
00459 
00460                 // if the connected sizes of the ports don't match
00461                 if (size1 != size2) {
00462                         phys1Invalid = true;
00463                         phys2Invalid = true;
00464                 }
00465 
00466                 port1Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port1);
00467 
00468                 port2Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port2);
00469         }
00470         // if port map1 has vectored logical signal
00471         else if (portMap1->logicalVector_ && !portMap2->logicalVector_) {
00472 
00473                 // port 1 uses the original physical bounds
00474                 QString port1 = General::port2String(portMap1->physicalPort_, phys1Left, phys1Right);
00475                 port1Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port1);
00476 
00477                 // port 2 uses the bounds of the logical port of port 1
00478                 QString port2 = General::port2String(portMap2->physicalPort_, 
00479                         portMap1->logicalVector_->getLeft(),
00480                         portMap1->logicalVector_->getRight());
00481                 
00482                 // if the logical port and port 2 sizes don't match
00483                 if (portMap1->logicalVector_->getSize() != size2) {
00484                         phys1Invalid = true;
00485                         phys2Invalid = true;
00486                 }
00487                 port2Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port2);
00488         }
00489         // if port map2 has vectored logical signal
00490         else if (!portMap1->logicalVector_ && portMap2->logicalVector_) {
00491                 
00492                 // port 1 uses the bounds of the logical port of port 2
00493                 QString port1 = General::port2String(portMap1->physicalPort_, 
00494                         portMap2->logicalVector_->getLeft(),
00495                         portMap2->logicalVector_->getRight());
00496 
00497                 // if the logical port and port 2 sizes don't match
00498                 if (portMap2->logicalVector_->getSize() != size1) {
00499                         phys1Invalid = true;
00500                         phys2Invalid = true;
00501                 }
00502                 port1Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port1);
00503 
00504                 // port 2 uses the original physical bounds
00505                 QString port2 = General::port2String(portMap2->physicalPort_, phys2Left, phys2Right);
00506                 port2Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port2);
00507         }
00508         // if neither has vectored logical signal
00509         else {
00510                 QString port1 = General::port2String(portMap1->physicalPort_, phys1Left, phys1Right);
00511                 port1Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port1);
00512                         
00513                 QString port2 = General::port2String(portMap2->physicalPort_, phys2Left, phys2Right);
00514                 port2Item = new QTableWidgetItem(port2);
00515 
00516                 // if sizes don't match then both must be marked as invalid
00517                 if (size1 != size2) {
00518                         phys1Invalid = true;
00519                         phys2Invalid = true;
00520                 }
00521         }
00522 
00523         // set the flags for the items
00524         port1Item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00525         port2Item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00526 
00527         // set the colors according to validity of items
00528         if (phys1Invalid) {
00529                 port1Item->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00530         }
00531         else {
00532                 port1Item->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::black));
00533         }
00534         if (phys2Invalid) {
00535                 port2Item->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::red));
00536         }
00537         else {
00538                 port2Item->setForeground(QBrush(Qt::black));
00539         }
00540         
00541         // add items to the port widget
00542         portWidget_.insertRow(row);
00543         portWidget_.setItem(row, 0, port1Item);
00544         portWidget_.setItem(row, 1, port2Item);
00545         ++row;
00546 }
